label: SupplyChainPackaging
comment: Any material with which supply chain goods are packaged, such as a box or bubble wrap.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying an additional instruction for this supply chain packaging.
The indication of whether or not there is an additional instruction for this supply chain packaging.
A code specifying a condition of this logistics packaging.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A code specifying a disposal method for this logistics packaging.
A code specifying an instruction for these trade payment terms.
A code specifying the type of logistics package.
The type, expressed as text, of supply chain packaging.
The indication of whether or not this supply chain packaging is recyclable.
The indication of whether or not this supply chain packaging is made of recycled material.
The percentage of recycled material in this supply chain packaging.
The indication of whether or not this logistics package is returnable.

objectProperties.comment: Disposal instructions applicable to this product batch.
A distinguishing material feature applicable to this trade product instance.
Instructions applicable to this logistics packaging.
Returnable asset instructions for this supply chain packaging.
A number of content layers in this logistics packaging.
The total number of units of this supply chain packaging facing the customer, such as would be seen when this packaging is placed on a retail shelf.
The total number of units in a layer of this supply chain packaging.
A linear dimension or a set of linear dimensions of this logistics packaging.
Maximum linear spatial dimensions of this trade product.
The number of units of this type of logistics packaging which can be stacked on top of each other.
The measure of the maximum stackability weight of this supply chain packaging.
Minimum linear spatial dimensions of this trade product.
A marking specified for this logistics packaging.
A total number of units contained in this logistics packaging.
A measure of a weight (mass) of this logistics packaging.

referencedBy.comment: Supply chain packaging used for this logistics package.
